title: 5 Tips on Getting Started with Audiobooks
tags: why you should listen to audiobooks
The beginner's great big guide to audiobooks
description: Get one Free Audiobook on Audible and also, support this channel.  Sign up now --   Find all the apps mention in this video here -   I listen to a lot of Audiobooks. Usually, while taking my evening stroll and before going to sleep. And in this video, I have shared my experience, on how a complete beginner can get started with Audiobooks.   [Video content]  Why you should listen to audiobooks  Tip #1 Use pocket to listen to blog post  Tip #2  Use Librivox for Free Audio books  Tip #3  Find good audiobooks on YouTube and Sound Cloud  Tip #4  Listen to podcast  Tip #5 Subscribe to Audible for best of best Audiobooks  [AudioBooks, I recommened]  Sherlock holmes by ruth golding on  librivox    Elon Musk by Ashlee Vance on Audible    For more suggestion, feel free to contact me.
